title: Mad double!
creator_credit: Thirtieth Cemalux and Home Entertainment Holdings
brief_description: Featuring the slapstick madness of two of Hollywood’s most famous comedy duos, Abbott and Costello and Laurel and Hardy, this compilation video also includes excerpts from two Abbott and Costello films and their classic comedy sketch “Who’s on first?” and two Laurel and Hardy films, “Tit for tat” and “Another fine mess”.
